categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Selah was a Human female who served as an agent of Imperial Intelligence, the intelligence agency of the reconstituted Sith Empire, during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, she was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Agent Selah first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Imperial Agent class trainer on Ilum.
